verses.verse: So they brought <WH935> the ark <WH727> of God, <WH430> and set <WH3322> it in the middle <WH8432> of the tent <WH168> that David <WH1732> had pitched <WH5186> for it: and they offered <WH7126> burnt <WH5930> sacrifices and peace <WH8002> offerings before <WH6440> God. <WH430>

And when David <WH1732> had made an end <WH3615> of offering <WH5927> the burnt <WH5930> offerings and the peace <WH8002> offerings, he blessed <WH1288> the people <WH5971> in the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And he dealt <WH2505> to every <WH376> one <WH376> of Israel, <WH3478> both man <WH376> and woman, <WH802> to every <WH376> one <WH376> a loaf <WH3603> of bread, <WH3899> and a good piece <WH829> of flesh, <WH829> and a flagon <WH809> of wine.

And he appointed <WH5414> certain of the Levites <WH3881> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD, <WH3068> and to record, <WH2142> and to thank <WH3034> and praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel: <WH3478>

Asaph <WH623> the chief, <WH7218> and next <WH4932> to him Zechariah, <WH2148> Jeiel, <WH3273> and Shemiramoth, <WH8070> and Jehiel, <WH3171> and Mattithiah, <WH4993> and Eliab, <WH446> and Benaiah, <WH1141> and Obededom: <WH5654> and Jeiel <WH3273> with psalteries <WH3627> and with harps; <WH3658> but Asaph <WH623> made a sound <WH8085> with cymbals; <WH4700>
Benaiah <WH1141> also and Jahaziel <WH3166> the priests <WH3548> with trumpets <WH2689> continually <WH8548> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of God. <WH430>
Then <WH227> on that day <WH3117> David <WH1732> delivered <WH5414> first <WH7218> this psalm to thank <WH3034> the LORD <WH3068> into the hand <WH3027> of Asaph <WH623> and his brothers. <WH251>
Give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD, <WH3068> call <WH7121> on his name, <WH8034> make known <WH3045> his deeds <WH5949> among the people. <WH5971>
Sing <WH7891> to him, sing psalms <WH2167> to him, talk <WH7878> you of all <WH3605> his wondrous <WH6381> works.
Glory <WH1984> you in his holy <WH6944> name: <WH8034> let the heart <WH3820> of them rejoice <WH8055> that seek <WH1245> the LORD. <WH3068>
Seek <WH1875> the LORD <WH3068> and his strength, <WH5797> seek <WH1245> his face <WH6440> continually. <WH8548>
Remember <WH2142> his marvelous <WH6381> works that he has done, <WH6213> his wonders, <WH4159> and the judgments <WH4941> of his mouth; <WH6310>
O you seed <WH2233> of Israel <WH3478> his servant, <WH5650> you children <WH1121> of Jacob, <WH3290> his chosen <WH972> ones.
He is the LORD <WH3068> our God; <WH430> his judgments <WH4941> are in all <WH3605> the earth. <WH776>
Be you mindful <WH2142> always <WH5769> of his covenant; <WH1285> the word <WH1697> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> to a thousand <WH505> generations; <WH1755>
Even of the covenant <WH1285> which <WH834> he made <WH3772> with Abraham, <WH85> and of his oath <WH7621> to Isaac; <WH3327>
And has confirmed <WH5975> the same to Jacob <WH3290> for a law, <WH2706> and to Israel <WH3478> for an everlasting <WH5769> covenant, <WH1285>
Saying, <WH559> To you will I give <WH5414> the land <WH776> of Canaan, <WH3667> the lot <WH2256> of your inheritance; <WH5159>
When you were but few, <WH4962> even a few, <WH4592> and strangers <WH1481> in it.
And when they went <WH1980> from nation <WH1471> to nation, <WH1471> and from one kingdom <WH4467> to another <WH312> people; <WH5971>
He suffered <WH3240> no <WH3808> man <WH376> to do them wrong: <WH6231> yes, he reproved <WH3198> kings <WH4428> for their sakes, <WH5921>
Saying, Touch <WH5060> not my anointed, <WH4899> and do my prophets <WH5030> no <WH408> harm. <WH7489>
Sing <WH7891> to the LORD, <WH3068> all <WH3605> the earth; <WH776> show <WH1319> forth <WH1319> from day <WH3117> to day <WH3117> his salvation. <WH3444>
Declare <WH5608> his glory <WH3519> among the heathen; <WH1471> his marvelous <WH6381> works among all <WH3605> nations. <WH5971>
For great <WH1419> is the LORD, <WH3068> and greatly <WH3966> to be praised: <WH1984> he also is to be feared <WH3372> above <WH5921> all <WH3605> gods. <WH430>
For all <WH3605> the gods <WH430> of the people <WH5971> are idols: <WH457> but the LORD <WH3068> made <WH6213> the heavens. <WH8064>
Glory <WH1935> and honor <WH1926> are in his presence; <WH6440> strength <WH5797> and gladness <WH2304> are in his place. <WH4725>
Give <WH3051> to the LORD, <WH3068> you kindreds <WH4940> of the people, <WH5971> give <WH3051> to the LORD <WH3068> glory <WH3519> and strength. <WH5797>

Give <WH3051> to the LORD <WH3068> the glory <WH3519> due to his name: <WH8034> bring <WH5375> an offering, <WH4503> and come <WH935> before <WH6440> him: worship <WH7812> the LORD <WH3068> in the beauty <WH1927> of holiness. <WH6944>
Fear <WH2342> before <WH6440> him, all <WH3605> the earth: <WH776> the world <WH8398> also <WH637> shall be stable, <WH3559> that it be not moved. <WH4131>
Let the heavens <WH8064> be glad, <WH8056> and let the earth <WH776> rejoice: <WH1523> and let men say <WH559> among the nations, <WH1471> The LORD <WH3068> reigns. <WH4427>
Let the sea <WH3220> roar, <WH7481> and the fullness <WH4393> thereof: let the fields <WH7704> rejoice, <WH5970> and all <WH3605> that is therein.
Then <WH227> shall the trees <WH6086> of the wood <WH3293> sing <WH7442> out at the presence <WH6440> of the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3588> he comes <WH935> to judge <WH8199> the earth. <WH776>
O give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD; <WH3068> for he is good; <WH2896> for his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever. <WH5769>

And say <WH559> you, Save <WH3467> us, O God <WH430> of our salvation, <WH3468> and gather <WH6908> us together, and deliver <WH5337> us from the heathen, <WH1471> that we may give thanks <WH3034> to your holy <WH6944> name, <WH8034> and glory <WH7623> in your praise. <WH8416>

Blessed <WH1288> be the LORD <WH3068> God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> for ever <WH5769> and ever <WH5704> <WH5769>. And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> said, <WH559> Amen, <WH543> and praised <WH1984> the LORD. <WH3068>

So he left <WH5800> there <WH8033> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> Asaph <WH623> and his brothers, <WH251> to minister <WH8334> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> continually, <WH8548> as every day's <WH3117> work <WH1697> required: <WH3117>
And Obededom <WH5654> with their brothers, <WH251> three score <WH8346> and eight; <WH8083> Obededom <WH5654> also the son <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> and Hosah <WH2621> to be porters: <WH7778>

And Zadok <WH6659> the priest, <WH3548> and his brothers <WH251> the priests, <WH3548> before <WH6440> the tabernacle <WH4908> of the LORD <WH3068> in the high <WH1116> place that was at Gibeon, <WH1391>

To offer <WH5927> burnt <WH5930> offerings to the LORD <WH3068> on the altar <WH4196> of the burnt <WH5930> offering continually <WH8548> morning <WH1242> and evening, <WH6153> and to do according to all <WH3605> that is written <WH3789> in the law <WH8451> of the LORD, <WH3068> which <WH834> he commanded <WH6680> Israel; <WH3478>

And with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun, <WH3038> and the rest <WH7605> that were chosen, <WH1305> who <WH834> were expressed <WH5344> by name, <WH8034> to give thanks <WH3034> to the LORD, <WH3068> because <WH3588> his mercy <WH2617> endures for ever; <WH5769>

And with them Heman <WH1968> and Jeduthun <WH3038> with trumpets <WH2689> and cymbals <WH4700> for those that should make a sound, <WH8085> and with musical <WH7892> instruments <WH3627> of God. <WH430> And the sons <WH1121> of Jeduthun <WH3038> were porters. <WH8179>
And all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> departed <WH3212> every man <WH376> to his house: <WH1004> and David <WH1732> returned <WH5437> to bless <WH1288> his house. <WH1004>
